attributes.action: STOP ALL NEW ANTI SMOKING LAWS
attributes.additional_details: All the new anti smoking laws such as (Plain Packaging,No displaying tobacco e.g.) is and idiotic idea  the govt is not going to achieve anything all your going to do is make it harder on small businesses. But you shooting yourself in the foot with all these bans on smoking because look at how much tax you make on tobacco products. ALL YOUR DOING IS RUINING THE COUNTRY
